meanings.definition: To steal goods from (a place), typically during a war or riot.
meanings.sent1: The thieves looted the store during the chaos.
meanings.sent2: The burglars looted the jewelry shop last night.
meanings.sent3: The raccoons looted the picnic basket when nobody was looking.
meanings.sent4: The storm looted the coastline of its sand dunes.
meanings.sent5: The pirates looted the treasure chest with excitement.
